main event: On October 6, 1961, an object was observed that appeared slightly larger than an airplane, bright silver in color with flashing lights, moving faster than an airplane for about 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as being bright silver with flashing lights., It was reported to be moving at speeds that exceeded those of an airplane., There was a total observation time of 5 minutes., No accompanying sounds were noted during the sighting., The sighting was unmatched by any conventional aircraft.
sighted object: a bright silver object with flashing lights
witness description: A civilian observed the object during an observation period.
